description: This file defines a 'Store' class for client-side storage management of 'todo' items, including methods for finding, saving, removing, and dropping data, with in-memory storage and callback-based API.

classes.name: Store
classes.description: A class for managing client-side storage of todo items, supporting CRUD operations and in-memory persistence.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes a new Store instance with a given database name and optional callback.

methods.name: find
methods.description: Finds items matching a query object and executes a callback with the results.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves all todo items and executes a callback with the data.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves or updates a todo item; generates a new ID if needed; executes callback after operation.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a todo item by ID and executes callback with remaining data.

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Clears all stored todo items and executes callback.
